snippet: Hugo Lindgren, editor of The New York Times Magazine, told the news to his staff at a noon meeting. No successor has been named.
abstract: Three journalists at The New York Times announce plans to leave newspaper; Hugo Lindgren, editor of The New York Times Magazine, is leaving at year's end; CNN hires media reporter Brian Stelter; Matt Bai, political correspondent for The New York Times Magazine, is joining Yahoo News in December.
lead_paragraph: Hugo Lindgren, editor of The New York Times Magazine, told the news to his staff at a noon meeting. No successor has been named.
